name: WHITE LOUNGE - Das Igludorf auf 2000m
description: The place to chill out is in the White Lounge. Comfortable deck chairs, laid-back lounge music, trendy cocktails and the joyful anticipation of a night, no one will forget. The White Lounge is also an Igloo Hotel with Igloo Suites for couples or a maximum of four persons. When the sun slips behind the peaks, the stars begin to shine in the sky and a sea of light starts to spread out down in the valley, that’s when guests head out on the romantic torch-lit hike to the restaurant. An enchanting dinner awaits them there. Afterwards it’s only a few minutes torch-lit walk back to the White Lounge. No one feels like getting into the Igloo quite yet. At over 2,000 meters altitude the starry sky is simply too stunning to look at while the campfire creates a very special atmosphere. Then you spend a cosy night tucked into your thick sleeping bag followed by a magnificent sunrise and a gourmet breakfast.  These really are the best prerequisites for enjoying another unforgettable day of your vacation.

Reservations only by persons who have reached the age of 18.
3 months prior to arrival: the reservation can be resolved without a cancellation fee.
Surcharge for weekend bookings.
Individual offers for parties, weddings, etc. on request.

Registration at the cash desk Ahornbahn before 4.00 p.m. Last ascent at  4.30 p.m. with the luggage (transport from top station). Walk along the panorama trail to reach the White Lounge, which is ready for the overnight stay from 5.00 p.m.

image.caption: White Lounge Iglu Chill out Area

makesOffer.name: Suite, running hot/cold water, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description:
Romantic Package for two includes:

- Romantic night in an Igloo Suite for two
- Ascent & descent with the Ahornbahn including luggage service
- Welcome drink
- Introduction and personal support service through trained guides
- Delicious dinner in relaxed atmosphere in the FREIRAUM
- Exciting torch hike with panoramic bonfire
- Curling
- Cozy sleeping bag
- Sparkling surprise
- Leisurely breakfast

makesOffer.name: Suite, running hot/cold water, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description:
BASIC Package includes:

- Ascent and descent incl. luggage service to your Igloo Suite from the summit station
- Welcome drink
- Introduction & personal support service through trained guides
- Delicious dinner in a relaxing atmosphere
- Exciting torch hike with panoramic bonfire
- Curling
- Cozy expedition sleeping bag with inner liner 
- Leisurely breakfast

Please note: When the White Lounge is fully booked, you may be accommodated together with 2 other guests in one igloo.
